The mentoring provides group workshops following the SOHK curriculum, supported by in-depth one-to-one mentoring sessions that provide a listening ear. Pupils play regular matches and receive rewards in the form of kit and trips. We see a dramatic improvement in behaviour, punctuality and attendance - all key predictors of educational attainment.
